body: I got gold about a month ago but the server stills say purhcasing emerald is $50, compared to upgrading for 25. Help?
body_tagged: I got gold about a month ago but the server stills say purhcasing emerald is $50, compared to upgrading for 25. Help?
title: A bit of help, please?

replies.body: It says you have to pay $50, but i'm pretty sure that if you'll buy it, you'll pay only $25, however i'm not sure, you should contact a Senior Staff Member.
replies.body_tagged: It says you have to pay $50, but i'm pretty sure that if you'll buy it, you'll pay only $25, however i'm not sure, you should contact a Senior Staff Member.

replies.body: I would buy gold and ask a sr mod to combine it
replies.body_tagged: I would buy gold and ask a sr mod to combine it

replies.body: When you go to check out you just have to go ahead and enter your username and when you fill out the payment info it should only say that you're paying $25.
replies.body_tagged: When you go to check out you just have to go ahead and enter your username and when you fill out the payment info it should only say that you're paying $25.

replies.body: That's not what it says. It sadly says 50$.
replies.body_tagged: That's not what it says. It sadly says 50$.

replies.body: If that's the case, then you should purchase another Gold rank and ask a Sr Mod + to merge your two Gold ranks.
